message: babcygirl just sent me some spam.

Nice to meet you. 
How are you today, I hope all is well with you .I am sorry to worry you with my Proposal for a relationship with you, but I know that you will grant my request in good sense and understanding,My name is Miss Nancy, i saw your contact today at www.convore.com and became interested in you,i will also like to know more about you. i'm hoping to hear from you soon so that I can send you more details about my self Including my picture. Here is my email address::::::::::::: (nancygirl4life2007@yahoo.com) I believe we can move from here. Bear in mind that Love has no colors barrier, no educational back ground barrier, no socio-economic Barrier, religious, language, nationality or distance barrier, the only important Thing is love. 
Yours Sincerely. 
Nancy
I got one of these several weeks ago... made me feel special.
the only important thing is love.
Oh by the way. On a related note....to whoever removed the unread spammy message in my inbox recently - thank you!
@Joltrast That was me :)  I'm just sorry that it happened in the first place :(
I just hope there is a way to stop them before they become unmanageable. At the moment they are just a very temporary irritation :o)
i have a fantastic idea (not really). BUT, for messages, a person would not be able to send a message without TYPED text, not just copy and paste. it would prevent a lot of spam.
